amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in contravention of the Religious Freedom Restoration Act of 1993, Executive Order 13279, or the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of the Religious Freedom Restoration Act of 1993, Executive Order 13279, or the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 186 (Roll no. 259).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
